chatbot package¶

Submodules¶

chatbot.account module¶

class chatbot.account.Account¶

Bases: object

Represent an account of a user

account_name: str¶

Name of the account.

account_number: str¶

The unique account number.

chatbot.account.list_accounts(user_id: str) → list[Account]¶

List all of the user’s accoutns.

Parameters:

user_id – The user ID of the account owner.

Returns:

All accounts that are avaialbe for transfering.

chatbot.account.list_transfer_target_accounts(user_id: str, from_account: str) → list[Account]¶

List all of the user’s accounts that the specified account can transfer to.

Parameters:

  • user_id – The user ID of the account owner.

  • from_account – The account number or account name that the fund will be transfered from.

Returns:

All the accounts that funds can be transfered from the specified account.

chatbot.account.transfer_between_accounts(user_id: str, from_account: str, to_account: str, amount: Decimal)¶

Transfer specific amount of fund from one account to the other of the same owner.

Parameters:

  • user_id – The user ID of the account owner.

  • from_account – The account number or account name that the fund will be transfered from.

  • to_account – The account number or account name that the fund will be transfered to.
